author: GameSpot
description:
Max and Richard talk Marvel. Richard has old man memory and reflexes, and is considering playing Marvel as a 1v4 player! Wait, what?! Max explains Tokons' core mechanic the assists, giving us insight on on how the game is flexible enough to accommodate players of all levels. 

00:00 Intro
00:30 4v4, 2v2, 1v4--the assists are up to you!
03:28 The three applications of the assists and the advantages of having assists
06:18 Marvel Tokon' pacing
08:41 Assist management
10:46 Okizeme, stage transitions, Neutral
14:00 How the combo limiter / meter works, we think
16:35 OH THATS RACHEL OF BLAZBLUE. Storm talk
19:08 OH THATS DUST. Assemble Slam aka universal overhead aka Dust
19:40 OH THATS DANTE. Starlord talk

CREDITS: Max B, Richard Li

#marvel   #gamespot
title: Marvel Tokon Gameplay Mechanics Discussion And Things We Found
